No matter how much you might try,\nyou can never stop the flow of time.%K%P
Whether you're human or a goddess...%K%P
And so there we were,\nfinally at that decisive moment.%K%P
'Gaaah, I'm so nervous...'%K%P
'Relax. You'll be fine.'%K%P
She was almost frozen in fear in front of me,\nso I tried to reassure her.%K%P
We were in an area that was actually closed off to\nanyone but participants and staff.%K%P
But Kagura had begged and pleaded\nuntil they let me back there too.%K%P
'Y-Yeah, you're right.\nI can do this! I can...'%K%P
'Come on, Kagura, get ahold of yourself.\nYou're going to go out there and put bright,\nshining smiles on everyone's face, right?'%K%P
'I know, I know.\nBut that doesn't mean I can't be nervous about it!'%K%P
I guess it was a bit of a stretch hoping I could just\ntalk her out of her anxiety.%K%P
Meanwhile, as we stood about worrying,\na familiar face had taken the stage.%K%P
'Hey, Kagura, look.\nIt's Shuri's turn.'%K%P
'Huh? Oh, you're right.'%K%P
I could practically feel how focused Kagura was as\nsoon as Shuri got on stage.%K%P
She had her eyes locked on her,\ntrying not to miss a single movement.%K%P
I had my eyes set on her, too.%K%P
She used to be part of our team,\nand now here she was as our rival.%K%P
'Go get 'em, Shuri...!'%K%P
Kagura whispered her cheer for her.%K%P
They might be rivals here,\nbut that didn't matter to her.%K%P
She would cheer Shuri on nevertheless.\nThat's just how Kagura was.%K%P
And then Shuri's performance started.%K%P
'Hi there, everyone! I'm Shuri Kisshoten!'%K%P
'Today I will be giving you all my\nvery best performance!'%K%P
'But tomorrow I'll have an even better one,\nand the day after that an even better one...'%K%P
'So all of those who want to see me grow and improve,\nplease cast your votes for me!'%K%P
'Okay then, here goes!'%K%P
The curtains pulled away,\nShuri took a deep breath,\nand started singing right along with the music.%K%P
Her voice was clear and beautiful,\nand washed over the audience.%K%P
It was like a wave of music...\nShe had a powerful voice that drew people in.%K%P
'Whoa...'%K%P
I heard Kagura breathe\na soft sigh in awe.%K%P
And I knew just how she felt.%K%P
We were witnessing just how hard Shuri had\nworked on her own after the duo had split...%K%P
All of the effort she had poured in was\nright there in her song.%K%P
We stood there with our eyes locked on her right up\nuntil she finished her performance.%K%P
'Thank you, everyone!'%K%P
As soon as she finished,\nthe whole venue broke out in applause.%K%P
This was how far Shuri had come...\nTo be honest, she shone brighter than any contestant.%K%P
And she walked straight towards us.%K%P
'Hey, good work out there.'%K%P
'Oh wow! Shuri! That was incredible!'%K%P
Kagura was still all excited and clapping.\nShuri wiped the sweat from her brow before speaking.%K%P
'If you're ready to congratulate your opponent that\nmuch, you must have something even better, huh?'%K%P
'Hardly!'%K%P
'I just was really, really impressed\nby what you did out there!'%K%P
'Geez... That's...\nWell, that's just really like you...'%K%P
Despite the way that she grimaced,\nyou could tell that wasn't disappointed.%K%P
'Well, you're next.\nDon't you dare go out there and\ngive anything but your very best.'%K%P
'Don't worry! After watching you out there\nI feel more pumped than ever!' %K%P
'So make sure you\nwatch my performance too, alright?'%K%P
'Wouldn't miss it.'%K%P
'Alright then, here goes.'%K%P
'Go get 'em, Kagura.\nDon't forget to make everyone smile!'%K%P
'I won't. Thanks, Yamato!'%K%P
None of the worry from a moment ago was left in her\nas she took off for the stage.%K%P
Shuri's performance actually gave her\njust the motivation she needed.%K%P
The two of them were just the perfect rivals,\npushing each other further and further.%K%P
'Hiya, I'm Kagura Amanouzu!\nHello everyone!!'%K%P
She took to the stage,\nboth hands waving widely as she stood dead-center.%K%P
Meanwhile, I felt like my heart was\nready to burst right through my chest.%K%P
This was the day we\nhad worked so hard towards for so long...%K%P
Win or lose, sink or swim,\nthis was where it all would happen.%K%P
'Go get 'em, Kagura...'%K%P
I couldn't do anything but cheer now.%K%P
But I felt like my feelings\nwould somehow still empower her.%K%P
'I'm not all that great at fancy, difficult stuff,\nbut I hope you'll all have fun with me anyway!!'%K%P
'I'll give you my very best song and dance,\nso stick with me, okay?'%K%P
'Alright then, here we go!'%K%P
She kicked off her dance to a song that\njust perfectly matched her upbeat mood.%K%P
She put her absolute everything into that dance,\nshowing off everything she had.%K%P
It was definitely a dance that could give Shuri's\nperformance a run for its money!%K%P
'Yeah! C'mon!\nLet's make some noise!'%K%P
'C'mon now! Let's gooo!!\nYeah! That's it!'%K%P
She shone on that stage,\nwith a real, bright smile on her face as she danced.%K%P
And not merely as a Wakemitama\nof Ame no Uzume, either...%K%P
She was out there as herself, performing as\nKagura Amanouzu.%K%P
'Okay! You're all the best!'%K%P
Before I knew it the entire audience had\ntaken up the rhythm of her song.%K%P
Everyone, man, woman, young and old\nseemed to be having so much fun...%K%P
This was the kind of power Kagura had.%K%P
'I'm so happy to be here!'%K%P
She made a huge jump.%K%P
And as she did, she let her Jinriki go,\nreleasing a brilliant light that flooded the stage.%K%P
It was quite the spectacle. As the divine light\nshone down, the audience went wild.%K%P
It was a spectacular finish,\nlike no one had seen before.%K%P
'Thank you everyone! I love you all!!'%K%P
She waved widely again as she\nsaid her thanks to everyone.%K%P
I did my best to fight back tears of joy.\nHer performance was one for smiles, not tears...%K%P
So I gave her the greatest applause I could,\nwith a huge smile on my face.%K%P
I was so happy for her,\nas her friend, as her boyfriend...%K%P
And also, as one of her fans...%K%P
